sentences: Ma pean kiirustama, et jõuaksin õigel ajal kohtumisele.
Ta töötab suure kiirusega ja alati täpselt.
Lapsest saadik on ta olnud kiire ja energiline.
context: The word 'kiirust' in Estonian refers to speed, haste, or swiftness. It describes the rate at which something moves or happens, often implying quickness and efficiency. In some contexts, it can refer to a time interval that characterizes a transition process.
